trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Set-JobTrigger
trans-unit.target: Set-JobTrigger

trans-unit.source: Set-JobTrigger
trans-unit.target: Set-JobTrigger

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Changes the job trigger of a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 變更排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Set-JobTrigger** cmdlet changes the properties of the job triggers of scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: **Set-jobtrigger** cmdlet 會變更排程工作的工作觸發程序屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to change the time or frequency at which the jobs start or to change from a time-based schedules to schedules that are triggered by a logon or startup.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它來變更工作啟動時間或頻率，或將以時間為基礎的排程變更為依登入或啟動而觸發的排程。

trans-unit.source: A "job trigger" defines a recurring schedule or conditions for starting a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 「 工作觸發程序 」 會定義循環的排程或啟動排程的工作的條件。

trans-unit.source: Although job triggers are not saved to disk, you can change the job triggers of scheduled jobs, which are saved to disk.
trans-unit.target: 雖然工作觸發程序不會儲存到磁碟，您可以變更排程工作 (會儲存到磁碟) 的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: To change a job trigger of a scheduled job, begin by using the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job trigger of a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更排程工作的工作觸發程序，請先使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 來取得排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Then, pipe the trigger to **Set-JobTrigger** or save the trigger in a variable and use the **InputObject** parameter of **Set-JobTrigger** cmdlet to identify the trigger.
trans-unit.target: 接著，使用管線傳送觸發程序 **Set-jobtrigger** 或觸發程序儲存在變數中並使用 **InputObject** 參數 **Set-jobtrigger** 指令程式來識別觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the remaining parameters of **Set-JobTrigger** to change the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 使用其餘參數的 **Set-jobtrigger** 若要變更工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: When you change the type of a job trigger, such as changing a job trigger from a daily or weekly trigger to an **AtLogon** trigger, the original trigger properties are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更工作觸發程序，例如每天或每週觸發程序來變更工作觸發程序類型 **AtLogon** 觸發程序中，屬性會刪除原始觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: However, if you change the values of the trigger, but not its type, such as changing the days in a weekly trigger, only the properties that you specify are changed.
trans-unit.target: 不過，若變更觸發程序的值但未變更其類型 (例如變更每週觸發程序中的星期幾)，則只會變更您指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: All other properties of the original job trigger are retained.
trans-unit.target: 原始工作觸發程序的所有其他屬性會維持不變。

trans-unit.source: **Set-JobTrigger** is one of a collection of job scheduling cmdlets in the PSScheduledJob module that is included in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Set-jobtrigger** 是 Windows PowerShell 所包含 PSScheduledJob 模組中工作排程 cmdlet 集合之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Scheduled Jobs, see the About topics in the PSScheduledJob module.
trans-unit.target: 如需排程工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 PSScheduledJob 模組中的「關於」主題。

trans-unit.source: Import the PSScheduledJob module and then type: `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` or see about_Scheduled_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 匯入 PSScheduledJob 模組，然後輸入︰ `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` 或請參閱 about_Scheduled_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Change the days in a job trigger
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 變更工作觸發程序中的星期幾

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to change the days in a weekly job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何變更每週工作觸發程序中的星期幾。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Change the job trigger type
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 變更工作觸發程序類型

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to change the type of job trigger that starts a job.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何變更啟動工作之工作觸發程序的類型。

trans-unit.source: The commands in this example replace an AtStartup job trigger with a weekly trigger.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中的命令會將 AtStartup 工作觸發程序取代為每週觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Change the user on a remote job trigger
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 變更使用者的遠端工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: This command changes the user in all AtLogon job triggers of scheduled jobs on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會變更 Server01 電腦上排程工作之所有 AtLogon 工作觸發程序的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a command on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 Server01 電腦上執行命令。

trans-unit.source: The remote command begins with a Get-ScheduledJob command that gets all scheduled jobs on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 遠端命令取得電腦的所有排程的工作的 Get-scheduledjob 命令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The scheduled jobs are piped to the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet, which gets the job triggers of the scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: Get-jobtrigger 指令程式，它會取得排程工作的工作觸發程序，會使用管線傳送排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: Each job trigger contains a **JobDefinition** property that contains the scheduled job, so the trigger remains associated with the scheduled job even when it is changed.
trans-unit.target: 每個工作觸發程序包含 **JobDefinition** 包含排程的工作，因此即使它已被變更觸發程序會保持與排程工作相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The job triggers are piped to the Where-Object cmdlet which gets job triggers that have the **User** property.
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序便會輸送到 Where-object 指令程式會取得工作觸發程序具有 **使用者** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The selected job triggers are piped to the **Set-JobTrigger** cmdlet, which changes the user to Domain01\Admin02.
trans-unit.target: 選取的工作觸發程序便會輸送到 **Set-jobtrigger** 指令程式，以將使用者變更為 Domain01\Admin02。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Change one of many job triggers
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 變更其中一個多工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: The commands in this example changes the repetition interval of the **Once** job trigger of SecurityCheck scheduled job from every 60 minutes to every 90 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中的命令會變更的重複間隔 **一次** SecurityCheck 排程工作從每隔 60 分鐘到每 90 分鐘的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The SecurityCheck scheduled job has three job triggers, so the commands use the **TriggerId** parameter of the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to identify the job trigger that is being changed.
trans-unit.target: SecurityCheck 排程的工作有三個工作觸發程序，因此命令會使用 **TriggerId** Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 來識別正在變更工作觸發程序的參數。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -At
trans-unit.target: 在

trans-unit.source: Starts the job at the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的日期和時間啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as one that the Get-Date cmdlet returns, or a string that can be converted to a time, such as "April 19, 2012 15:00", "12/31/2013 9:00 PM", or "3am".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如 Get-date 指令程式傳回，或可以轉換成一段時間，例如字串"2012 年 4 月 19 日 15:00"，"12/31/2013年 9:00 PM 」，或"3am"。

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify an element of the DateTime object, such as seconds, that element of the job trigger is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 DateTime 物件的某個元素 (例如秒)，則該工作觸發程序的該元素不會變更。

trans-unit.source: If the original job trigger didn't include a DateTime object and you omit an element, the job trigger is created with the corresponding element from the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: 若原始工作觸發程序未包含 DateTime 物件且您省略某個元素，則會使用具有目前日期和時間的對應元素來建立工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: When using the **Once** parameter, set the value of the **At** parameter to a particular date and time.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 **一次** 參數的值設定 **在** 參數，以特定日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: Because the default date in a **DateTime** object is the current date, setting a time before the current time without an explicit date results in a job trigger for a time in the past.
trans-unit.target: 因為中的預設日期 **DateTime** 物件是目前的日期，而不需要明確的日期為目前時間之前的時間結果中設定工作的觸發程序在過去的時間。

trans-unit.source: **DateTime** objects, and strings that are converted to **DateTime** objects, are automatically adjusted to be compatible with the date and time formats selected for the local computer in **Region and Language** in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: **DateTime** 物件和字串轉換成 **DateTime** 物件，會自動調整選取本機電腦中的日期和時間格式與 **地區和語言** 控制台] 中。

trans-unit.source: -AtLogOn
trans-unit.target: -AtLogOn

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled job when the specified users log on to the computer.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的使用者登入電腦時啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: To specify a user, use the **User** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定使用者，使用 **使用者** 參數。

trans-unit.source: -AtStartup
trans-unit.target: -AtStartup

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled job when Windows starts.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 啟動時啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -Daily
trans-unit.target: -每日

trans-unit.source: Specifies a recurring daily job schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定每日週期性工作排程。

trans-unit.source: Use the other parameters in the Daily parameter set to specify the schedule details.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Daily 參數中的其他參數來指定排程詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: -DaysInterval
trans-unit.target: -DaysInterval

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of days between occurrences on a daily schedule.
trans-unit.target: 在每日排程上指定執行週期間隔天數。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 3 starts the scheduled job on days 1, 4, 7 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3 的值會在第 1、4、7 天啟動排程工作，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: -DaysOfWeek
trans-unit.target: -DaysOfWeek

trans-unit.source: Specifies the days of the week on which a weekly scheduled job runs.
trans-unit.target: 指定每週排程工作要在星期幾執行。

trans-unit.source: Enter day names, such as '"Monday", "Thursday"', integers 0-6, where 0 represents Sunday, or an asterisk (*) to represent every day.
trans-unit.target: 輸入星期幾名稱 (例如 '"Monday"、"Thursday"'、0-6 的整數，其中 0 代表 Sunday)，或輸入星號 (*) 以代表每一天。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required in the Weekly parameter set.
trans-unit.target: 在 Weekly 參數集中，此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Day names are converted to their integer values in the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 星期幾名稱會轉換成其工作觸發程序中的整數值。

trans-unit.source: When you enclose day names in quotation marks in a command, enclose each day name in separate quotation marks, such as "Monday", "Tuesday".
trans-unit.target: 當您在命令中將星期幾名稱放在引號中時，請將每個星期幾名稱放在各自的引號中，例如 "Monday"、"Tuesday"。

trans-unit.source: If you enclose multiple day names in a single quotation mark pair, the corresponding integer values are summed.
trans-unit.target: 若將多個星期幾名稱放在一組引號中，則會加總對應的整數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, "Monday, Tuesday" (1, 2) results in a value of "Wednesday" (3).
trans-unit.target: 例如，"Monday, Tuesday" (1, 2) 會產生 "Wednesday" (3) 的值。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 指定工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains **ScheduledJobTrigger** objects or type a command or expression that gets **ScheduledJobTrigger** objects, such as a Get-JobTrigger command.
trans-unit.target: 輸入變數，其中包含 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 物件，或輸入的命令或運算式，取得 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 物件，例如 Get-jobtrigger 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a **ScheduledJobTrigger** object to **Set-JobTrigger**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 物件傳遞給 **Set-jobtrigger**。

trans-unit.source: If you specify multiple job triggers, **Set-JobTrigger** makes the same changes to all job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定多個工作觸發程序， **Set-jobtrigger** 所有工作觸發程序會都進行相同變更。

trans-unit.source: -Once
trans-unit.target: 一次

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-recurring (one time) schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定非週期性 (一次性) 排程。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns the job triggers that changed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已變更的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -RandomDelay
trans-unit.target: -RandomDelay

trans-unit.source: Enables a random delay that begins at the scheduled start time, and sets the maximum delay value.
trans-unit.target: 啟用排定的開始時間前的隨機延遲，並設定最大延遲值。

trans-unit.source: The length of the delay is set pseudo-randomly for each start and varies from no delay to the time specified by the value of this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 延遲長度是在每次開始前隨機設定，其值介於無延遲到此參數值所指定的時間之間。

trans-unit.source: The default value, zero (00:00:00), disables the random delay.
trans-unit.target: 預設值零 (00:00:00) 會停用隨機延遲。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one returned by the New-TimeSpan cmdlet, or enter a value in \<hours\>:\<minutes\>:\<seconds\> format, which is automatically converted to a timespan object.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如由 New-timespan cmdlet，或輸入值 \<小時\>:\<分鐘\>:\<秒\> 格式，會自動轉換為 timespan 物件。

trans-unit.source: -RepetitionDuration
trans-unit.target: -Timespan.maxvalue

trans-unit.source: Repeats the job until the specified time expires.
trans-unit.target: 重複執行工作，直到經過指定的時間。

trans-unit.source: The repetition frequency is determined by the value of the **RepetitionInterval** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 重複頻率由值決定 **RepetitionInterval** 參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of **RepetitionInterval** is 5 minutes and the value of **RepetitionDuration** is 2 hours, the job is triggered every five minutes for two hours.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果值 **RepetitionInterval** 是 5 分鐘到數 **RepetitionDuration** 是 2 小時，工作會觸發兩個小時內每隔五分鐘。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one that the New-TimeSpan cmdlet returns or a string that can be converted to a timespan object, such as "1:05:30".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如一 New-timespan cmdlet 會傳回，或可以轉換為 timespan 物件，例如字串"1: 05:30 」。

trans-unit.source: To run a job indefinitely, set the value of the **RepetitionDuration** parameter to \[TimeSpan\]::MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 若要無限期地執行工作，將設定的值 **RepetitionDuration** 參數 \[TimeSpan\]:: MaxValue。

trans-unit.source: To stop a job before the job trigger repetition duration expires, set the **RepetitionDuration** value to zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要在工作觸發程序重複期間過期之前，請停止工作，設定 **RepetitionDuration** 值為零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: To change the repetition duration or repetition interval of a **Once** job trigger, the command must include both the **RepetitionInterval** and **RepetitionDuration** parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的重複期間或重複間隔 **一次** 工作觸發程序，命令必須包含 **RepetitionInterval** 和 **RepetitionDuration** 參數。

trans-unit.source: To change the repetition duration or repetition intervals of other types of job triggers, the command must include the **Once**, **At**, **RepetitionInterval** and **RepetitionDuration** parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的重複期間或其他類型的工作觸發程序的重複間隔，命令必須包含 **一次**, ，**在**, ，**RepetitionInterval** 和 **RepetitionDuration** 參數。

trans-unit.source: -RepetitionInterval
trans-unit.target: -RepetitionInterval

trans-unit.source: Repeats the job at the specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的時間間隔重複執行工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of this parameter is 2 hours, the job is triggered every two hours.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若此參數的值是設定為 2 小時，則每隔兩小時會觸發一次工作。

trans-unit.source: The default value, 0, does not repeat the job.
trans-unit.target: 預設值 0 不會重複執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one that the New-TimeSpan cmdlet returns or a string that can be converted to a timespan object, such as "1:05:30".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如一 New-timespan cmdlet 會傳回，或可以轉換為 timespan 物件，例如字串"1: 05:30 」。

trans-unit.source: To change the repetition duration or repetition interval of a **Once** job trigger, the command must include both the **RepetitionInterval** and **RepetitionDuration** parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的重複期間或重複間隔 **一次** 工作觸發程序，命令必須包含 **RepetitionInterval** 和 **RepetitionDuration** 參數。

trans-unit.source: To change the repetition duration or repetition intervals of other types of job triggers, the command must include the **Once**, **At**, **RepetitionInterval** and **RepetitionDuration** parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的重複期間或其他類型的工作觸發程序的重複間隔，命令必須包含 **一次**, ，**在**, ，**RepetitionInterval** 和 **RepetitionDuration** 參數。

trans-unit.source: -User
trans-unit.target: 使用者

trans-unit.source: Specifies the users who trigger an **AtLogon** start of a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 指定觸發程序的使用者 **AtLogon** 啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of a user in \<UserName\> or \<Domain\Username\> format or enter an asterisk (*) to represent all users.
trans-unit.target: 輸入中的使用者名稱 \<UserName\> 或 \<網域 \ 使用者名稱\> 格式，或輸入星號 （*） 代表所有使用者。

trans-unit.source: The default value is all users.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是所有使用者。

trans-unit.source: -Weekly
trans-unit.target: -每週

trans-unit.source: Specifies a recurring weekly job schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定週期性每週工作排程。

trans-unit.source: Use the other parameters in the Weekly parameter set to specify the schedule details.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Weekly 參數中的其他參數來指定排程詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: -WeeksInterval
trans-unit.target: -WeeksInterval

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of weeks between occurrences on a weekly job schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定每週工作排程的週次。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 3 starts the scheduled job on weeks 1, 4, 7 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3 的值會在第 1、4、7 週啟動排程工作，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger

trans-unit.source: You can pipe multiple job triggers to Set-JobTrigger.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線傳送多個工作觸發程序至 Set-JobTrigger。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger
trans-unit.target: 無或 Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger

trans-unit.source: When you use the **Passthru** parameter, **Set-JobTrigger** returns the job triggers that were changed.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 **Passthru** 參數， **Set-jobtrigger** 傳回已變更的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: Job triggers have a **JobDefintion** property that associates them with the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序有 **JobDefintion** 將它們與排程工作相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you change the job trigger of a scheduled job, the job is changed.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更排程工作的工作觸發程序時，工作也會被變更。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use a Set-ScheduledJob command to apply the changed trigger to the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要使用 Set-scheduledjob 命令，以套用變更的觸發程序至排程工作。
